Bruiser.desc: Your character believes that solving problems is best handled through quick application of physical force.

Nutter.desc: Your character can safely be categorised as insane, though they are functional and able to work within the organisation of the Laundry. Rational thought and problem-solving methods are neglected: insane leaps of logic are the primary means of attaining goals.
Nutter.special: Reduce starting SAN by 20 points and assign an appropriate mental disorder. Depending on the disorder, your character may be in therapy or on medication to deal with the symptoms.
